園.definition: land used for growing plants; site used for public recreation; abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

園區.definition: site developed for a group of related enterprises; (industrial or technology) park

園遊會.definition: (Tw) garden party; fete (held in a garden or park); carnival; fair

園長.definition: person in charge of a place that ends in 園|园, such as a vineyard 葡萄園|葡萄园, zoo 動物園|动物园, cemetery 陵園|陵园 etc
